archimate:Capability.name: Customer Experience Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Customer Experience Management defines the customer maturity matrix, analyze Key Capability Indicators, and determine customer maturity level for each dimension. It defines lifecycle states, map the customer to a lifecycle state periodically review and update the lifecycle, as well as analyzing the lifecycle state for cross-sections of customers. It also define customer experience KCIs/KQIs and map KQIs to lifecycle phase and channel. Capture KCIs/KQIs and perform analysis upon them.
